personal.name: Tanmay Kumar
personal.title: MERN Stack Developer & Founding Engineer
personal.tagline: Building scalable restaurant management systems and AI-powered applications
personal.bio: I am a MERN stack developer and problem solver focused on building scalable restaurant management systems and AI-powered applications. I have extensive experience in backend development, database operations, API authentication, and GenAI integration. I specialize in creating data-driven solutions that improve operational efficiency and decision-making in fast-moving startup environments where ownership and impact are important.

experience.title: Founding Engineer
experience.description: Architected comprehensive restaurant management platform with full-stack MERN implementation. Built advanced invoice extraction system using Gemini OCR for automated vendor data processing and ingredient mapping. Engineered recipe automation system by fetching POS menu data and implementing Gemini context caching to generate complete recipes with ingredients, quantities, and cooking instructions. Developed inventory management system with multi-unit conversions and automated ingredient tracking based on POS sales integration. Designed super admin panel for global tenant management and centralized restaurant data administration. Engineered robust backend APIs with Node.js and Express.js, implementing secure authentication and database operations. Created dynamic MongoDB collections with automated workflows and interactive dashboards for real-time financial metrics and profit analytics using React.js.
achievements: Built comprehensive restaurant management platform serving multiple restaurants
Automated invoice processing reducing manual data entry by 90%
Developed inventory management with real-time tracking
Created super admin panel for multi-tenant management

projects.title: Advanced Invoice Extraction System
projects.shortDescription: AI-powered invoice processing system for restaurant supply chain automation
projects.description: Built comprehensive invoice processing system using Node.js and Gemini OCR for restaurant supply chain automation. Implemented vendor-specific parsing rules with dynamic MongoDB collections and ingredient mapping algorithms. Created context caching system with Gemini API for optimized data extraction and automated JSON output processing. Developed column mapping system for various vendor formats, reducing manual data entry by 90%.

projects.title: AI-Powered Video Generation System
projects.shortDescription: Sophisticated prompt generation system for Veo3 video creation
projects.description: Engineered sophisticated prompt generation system for Veo3 video creation using advanced prompts. Integrated Gemini API for automated content transformation and JSON output processing. Built dynamic video generation workflows for product visualizations and marketing content, achieving 85% automation in content creation pipeline.

projects.title: Restaurant Management Dashboard
projects.shortDescription: Comprehensive MERN stack application for restaurant operations
projects.description: Developed comprehensive MERN stack application for restaurant operations management. Implemented real-time analytics for food costs, menu pricing, and profit tracking. Built secure authentication system with role-based access control. Created responsive frontend with React.js and robust backend APIs with Express.js and MongoDB.

projects.title: Voice-Controlled AI Chatbot
projects.shortDescription: Interactive chatbot with Gemini AI integration and voice features
projects.description: Developed interactive chatbot using vanilla JavaScript with Gemini AI API integration. Implemented speech-to-text functionality and text-to-speech output with dark mode toggle. Created auto-resizing interface with dynamic API response handling for seamless user experience.

education.degree: B. Tech - Computer Science and Engineering
education.institution: SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Delhi NCR Campus
education.description: Focused on software engineering, data structures, algorithms, and web development.

certifications.title: Introduction to Front-End Development by Meta

achievements.title: Hackathon Winner - IIT Patna
achievements.description: Developed Chrome extension with AI-powered text summarization and code explanation features using Gemini API. Implemented voice functionality for content reading and instant webpage text analysis.
